**As a Full-Stack Developer**
**I need to create a website**
**So that users can register, login and browse products**

### Details and Assumptions
    * Frontend, Backend and Deployment

### Acceptance Criteria
        gherkin
    Given the website
    When developed
    Then Full-Stack development skills learnt
